trans-unit.source: Provides data for a focus-changed event.
trans-unit.target: Stellt Daten für ein Fokuswechselereignis bereit.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.
trans-unit.target: Die [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] des Objekts, das den Fokus erhalten hat.

trans-unit.source: The child [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.
trans-unit.target: Die untergeordnete [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] des Objekts, das den Fokus erhalten hat.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs" /> class.

The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object identifiers that UI Automation clients can use to link an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
trans-unit.target: Die `idObject` und `idChild` Parameter enthalten die [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] -Objektbezeichner, mit dem Benutzeroberflächen-Automatisierungsclients Verknüpfen einer <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> auf ein `IAccessible` Objekt in einer älteren barrierefreie Anwendung.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] identifier of the object receiving focus.
trans-unit.target: Ruft den untergeordneten [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)]-Bezeichner des Objekts ab, das den Fokus erhält.

trans-unit.source: Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application.
trans-unit.target: Objekt [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] sind 32-Bit-Werte, die Kategorien von barrierefreiheitsobjekten innerhalb einer Anwendung zu identifizieren.

trans-unit.source: The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
trans-unit.target: Die `idObject` und `idChild` Parameter enthalten, das Objekt [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] , dass Clients verwenden können, für das Verknüpfen einer <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> auf ein `IAccessible` Objekt in einer älteren barrierefreie Anwendung.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: Ruft die [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] des [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)]-Objekts ab, das das Ereignis generiert hat.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element that is receiving focus.
trans-unit.target: Die [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] des [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]-Elements, das den Fokus erhält.

trans-unit.source: For possible values, see [Object Identifiers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation.
trans-unit.target: Mögliche Werte finden Sie unter [Objektbezeichner](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) in der Dokumentation zu Microsoft Active Accessibility.

trans-unit.source: Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application.
trans-unit.target: Objekt [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] sind 32-Bit-Werte, die Kategorien von barrierefreiheitsobjekten innerhalb einer Anwendung zu identifizieren.

trans-unit.source: The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
trans-unit.target: Die `idObject` und `idChild` Parameter enthalten, das Objekt [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] , dass Clients verwenden können, für das Verknüpfen einer <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> auf ein `IAccessible` Objekt in einer älteren barrierefreie Anwendung.
